description: Agent Lightning APO Training Dashboard - ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ ÏµúÏ†ÅÌôî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞ÎßÅ

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value'])
| extend rollout_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.rollout_id'])
| extend attempt_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.attempt_id'])
| summarize 
    ['Total Rollouts'] = dcount(rollout_id),
    ['Total Attempts'] = dcount(attempt_id),
    ['Total Annotations'] = count(),
    ['Avg Reward'] = round(avg(reward), 2),
    ['Success Rate (%)'] = round(countif(reward == 1) * 100.0 / count(), 1)

panels.description: ÏãúÍ∞ÑÎ≥Ñ ÌèâÍ∑† reward Î∞è ÏÑ±Í≥µÎ•† Ï∂îÏù¥

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value'])
| where isnotnull(reward)
| summarize 
    avg_reward = avg(reward),
    success_rate = countif(reward == 1) * 1.0 / count()
    by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: üìà Reward Trend Over Time

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value'])
| where isnotnull(reward)
| extend result = iff(reward == 1, "Success (1)", "Fail (0)")
| summarize count = count() by result

dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value'])
| extend rollout_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.rollout_id'])
| where isnotnull(reward) and isnotempty(rollout_id)
| summarize success_rate = avg(reward) by rollout_id
| top 10 by success_rate desc
| project rollout = substring(rollout_id, 3, 8), success_rate

dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend rollout_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.rollout_id'])
| extend attempt_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.attempt_id'])
| summarize 
    rollouts = dcount(rollout_id),
    attempts = dcount(attempt_id)
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| order by timestamp asc

dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value'])
| extend rollout_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.rollout_id'])
| extend attempt_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.attempt_id'])
| summarize 
    attempts = dcount(attempt_id),
    avg_reward = round(avg(reward), 2),
    success_count = countif(reward == 1),
    last_time = max(timestamp)
    by rollout_id
| order by last_time desc
| take 20

dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "agentlightning.annotation"
| extend 
    reward = todouble(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.value']),
    reward_name = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.reward.0.name']),
    rollout_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.rollout_id']),
    attempt_id = tostring(customDimensions['agentlightning.attempt_id'])
| project timestamp, rollout_id, attempt_id, reward, reward_name
| order by timestamp desc
| take 50

panels.description: ÌïôÏäµ ÏôÑÎ£å ÏöîÏïΩ - ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ Î≥ÄÌôî Ïó¨Î∂Ä ÌôïÏù∏

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "training.complete"
| extend 
    total_rounds = toint(customDimensions['training.total_rounds']),
    prompt_versions = toint(customDimensions['training.prompt_versions']),
    best_reward = todouble(customDimensions['training.best_reward']),
    prompt_changed = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.changed'])
| summarize 
    ['Total Rounds'] = max(total_rounds),
    ['Prompt Versions'] = max(prompt_versions),
    ['Best Reward'] = max(best_reward),
    ['Prompt Changed'] = countif(prompt_changed == "True")

panels.title: üéì Training Summary

panels.description: Ï¥àÍ∏∞ ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ vs ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ ÎπÑÍµê

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "training.complete"
| extend 
    initial_prompt = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.initial']),
    final_prompt = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.final']),
    changed = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.changed']),
    initial_len = toint(customDimensions['prompt.initial_length']),
    final_len = toint(customDimensions['prompt.final_length']),
    best_reward = todouble(customDimensions['training.best_reward'])
| extend length_change = strcat(initial_len, " ‚Üí ", final_len)
| project timestamp, changed, length_change, best_reward, initial_prompt, final_prompt
| order by timestamp desc
| take 5

panels.title: üîÑ Initial vs Final Prompt Comparison

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name in ("prompt.initial", "prompt.updated", "prompt.history")
| extend 
    version = toint(customDimensions['prompt.version']),
    round = toint(customDimensions['prompt.round']),
    prompt_content = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.content']),
    prompt_length = toint(customDimensions['prompt.length']),
    prompt_type = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.type'])
| project timestamp, version, round, prompt_length, prompt_type, prompt_content
| order by version asc

dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "prompt.optimized_final"
| extend 
    best_reward = todouble(customDimensions['prompt.best_reward']),
    prompt_length = toint(customDimensions['prompt.length']),
    length_change = toint(customDimensions['prompt.length_change']),
    optimized_prompt = tostring(customDimensions['prompt.content'])
| project timestamp, best_reward, prompt_length, length_change, optimized_prompt
| order by timestamp desc
| take 5

panels.description: ÎùºÏö¥ÎìúÎ≥Ñ Reward Ï∂îÏù¥ - ÌïôÏäµ ÏßÑÌñâ ÏÉÅÌô©

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where cloud_RoleName contains "agentlightning"
| where name == "rollout.result"
| extend 
    round_number = toint(customDimensions['round.number']),
    avg_reward = todouble(customDimensions['rewards.average'])
| where isnotnull(avg_reward)
| summarize avg_reward = avg(avg_reward) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: üìà Training Progress (Reward over Time)

title: Agent Lightning APO Training
